body:
I was wondering if any of you guys have pets ! If so comment a cute photo of them description  and there names !


 My cats name : Ruby
Breed : Turkish Van (Im from England)
What he/she has done : 
  • Jumped out a window 
  • Gained me an infraction for lying on my keyboard
  • Many scars
  • Got lost
  • Had 20 fights with other cats
  • Almost got sat on 100+ times!
Picture :

My dogs name : Simon
Breed : Snoozer and Poodle 
What he/she has done : 
Ignore me 24/7 unless I have his rope or ball
Do his business in the house 100+
Launches his ball under the couch and makes me go get it

I'm sorry but here: http://www.avicus.net/forums/6a7e259c4?page=1 Post was already made

replies.body:
My dogs name: Lola
Breed: Labrador retriever mixed with newfoundland
What he/she has done:
Been a great dog.
Loves playing in the snow and sleeping on my bed haha.
I may post a picture later but you can just type in newfador and my dog looks like one of those but a tiny bit shorter haired.

I am also getting a pure breed Labrador retriever in like 3 weeks, ill post a picture when I get the puppy!
But heres the puppy were getting (one of the black ones)
